etymology.interpretation: 卜 contributes the semantic idea (originally associated with divination), while 月 provides the sound, aligning with the Old Chinese reconstruction. The semantic link to “outside” is not transparent in the phono-semantic analysis; some scholars propose an alternative ideogrammic reading involving the moon’s partial phases, but the mainstream view treats 月 here as phonetic.

examples.chinese: 我们对外贸易增长很快(我們對外貿易增長很快)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen duìwài màoyì zēngzhǎng hěn kuài.
examples.english: Our foreign trade is growing very quickly.

examples.chinese: 他住在城外的一个小村子(他住在城外的一個小村子)。
examples.pinyin: Tā zhù zài chéngwài de yí gè xiǎo cūnzi.
examples.english: He lives in a small village outside the city.

examples.chinese: 这家餐厅接待很多外国游客(這家餐廳接待很多外國遊客)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng jiēdài hěn duō wàiguó yóukè.
examples.english: This restaurant serves many foreign tourists.
